attributes.action: On ESA and living with partner
attributes.additional_details:
My partner goes to work I would but I cannot due to bad health. Our income is only what my partner earns.
Fact: Everyone gets bad health in their lives.
Fact: Government are stealing what we put in to the system.
Fact: After a year on ESA, the ESA will go into means tested benefit.
Fact: If partner earns so much but so little due to having a family ESA can be stopped.
Fact: Arguements are made, no sleep, not eating much. You feel worse than ever before.
Please help me and everyone who is suffering with this and put a stop to this once and for all.
Thank you
